nodes.text: Southern Rim NavHaz was a scientific agency that monitored hyperspace navigational hazards in the southern portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was in existence by the time of the New Republic.

Ison, a star system in the Outer Rim's Greater Javin region, was enclosed by nebula wisps that made hyperspace travel through the area risky. Southern Rim NavHaz reported that within a few centuries these coalescing gases and debris would effectively close the Rimward end of the Ison Corridor hyperlane, rendering the route obsolete.
The Southern Rim NavHaz agency was created for "Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin," a 2004 Wizards of the Coast online supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
